dialog.text: Hello, Moronihah. Is there something I can help you with?

prompt.next_dialog: Ah, I see that Gadianton has let you into our secret band. ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ Wait, why are you drawing your weapon on me? Guards!
Very well. You can always talk to our chief judge in Zarahemla if you're not sure what to do.

dialog.text: Thank you for dealing with Nehor. He was mounting quite a rebellion in this city.
Thank you for dealing with Nehor. He was mounting quite a rebellion in this city. I don't know where he fled to, but he had many followers in Ammonihah, to the south by the head of the river Sidon.

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: Seezoram is our lower judge, who rules over the city of Hermounts. He wishes to thank you for your aid.

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: Seezoram is our lower judge, who rules over the city of Hermounts. He wishes to thank you for your aid.
